mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_TYPE as "${columnPrefix}type", ${tableAlias}S_MODULE as "${columnPrefix}module", ${tableAlias}D_CREATETIME as "${columnPrefix}createTime", ${tableAlias}S_CREATESTAFFNAME as "${columnPrefix}createstaffname", ${tableAlias}S_CREATESTAFFID as "${columnPrefix}createstaffid", ${tableAlias}S_ADDRESSIP as "${columnPrefix}addressip", ${tableAlias}S_CONTENT as "${columnPrefix}content"
